#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define N 500000
int fac[N + 1];
int sqr[N + 1];
void PreCompute()
{
    int i,j;
    for(i = 1 ; i<=N ; i++)
    {
        for(j = i; j<=N ; j+=i)
        {
            fac[j]++;
        }
    }
    int val = 0;
    for(i = 1 ; i<=707 ; i++)
    {
        val = val + i + i - 1;
        sqr[val] = i;
    }
}
int main()
{
    PreCompute();
    int tc,t;
    scanf("%d",&tc);
    for(t = 1 ; t<=tc ; t++)
    {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int p = fac[n]/2 - 1;
        int res = 1,mark1 = 0,mark2 = 0;
        if(sqr[n] != 0) res = sqr[n];
        if(n >= 10000)
        {
            mark2 = 1;
            n = n%10000;
        }
        if(res >= 10000)
        {
            mark1 = 1;
            res = res%10000;
        }
        while(p > 0)
        {
            if(p&1)
            {
                res = res*n;
                if(mark2 == 1) mark1 = 1;
                if(res >= 10000)
                {
                    mark1 = 1;
                    res = res%10000;
                }
            }
            p = p/2;
            n = n*n;
            if(n >= 10000)
            {
                n = n%10000;
                mark2 = 1;
            }
        }
        if(mark1 == 0)
        {
            printf("%d\n",res);
            continue;
        }
        else if(res == 0)
        {
            printf("0000\n");
            continue;
        }
        else if(res < 10)
        {
            printf("000%d\n",res);
            continue;
        }
        else if(res < 100)
        {
            printf("00%d\n",res);
            continue;
        }
        else if(res < 1000)
        {
            printf("0%d\n",res);
            continue;
        }
        else printf("%d\n",res);
    }
    return 0;
}
